item.description:
We did this last year and had a blast-it gets super crowded at the starting point so prepare yourself in terms of parking. Bring you cameras and your creativity in regards to outfits-people go all out for the occasion--not to be missed! Let's show some Frenchie presence!

4th Annual Divas Unleashed™ Halloween Pet Parade

Benefiting the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty
to Animals (ASPCA)

When: Sunday, October 26, 2008
Check-in: 10am-11:30am
Where: DoggieDay Play Center @ 400 Tremont Street, Boston 02116
More Info: www.doggieday.com/halloween
Photos from last year: www.lamusephoto.com click on ‘view your
shoot’, click on Divas album

Save the Date All!
This year, our annual Halloween Pet Parade, Divas Unleashed™
promises to be bigger and better than last year, including the
prizes!

For the third year in a row, Randy Price of WHDH Channel 7 News
will be your Emcee for the Finalist Fashion Show and will be
awarding the prizes.

This year, your Grande Divas are Universal Motown recording
group JADA; you can view their website at www.jadamusic.com.

Judges:
Freelance Fashion Writer and Stylist, Erica Corsano
Dir of Marketing for the ASPCA, NY
AKC Judge

Again for the third year in a row, the parade is led by the
Salem High School Marching Band and Color Guard. You will be
led down the parade route to the sounds of some of your
favorite Halloween songs including the theme to Star Wars, the
Munster Mash and many others.

Ruff Ruffman from FETCH on PBS for kids! will be marching with
our VIP’s

Photographers and Press:
You can be a star! Each year in the past, the parade has made
it onto many news stations and internet sites. This year will
be no exception!

In addition to the news coverage with video and print, we have
put together of group of our own ‘paparazzi’ or ‘paw-parazzi’
for the day. Assembled will be a group of professional
photographers snapping candid shots at what we hope to be each
participant with your hopes of making it big! These photos
will be posted on their respective websites within days after
the parade.

Parade Route:
At 12noon, the parade commences at 400 Tremont Street, Boston
MA 02116; The DoggieDay Play Center.

The parade will be led down Tremont Street heading toward the
Boston Common, making a slight left onto South Charles St,
continuing across Stuart Street, across Boylston Street at
which point the parade marches up into the Boston Common on the
sidewalk, heading to the band stand where festivities and
awarding of prizes will take place.

Parking:
For those who will be driving in for the parade, parking can
best be found at the end of the parade route at the Boson
Common Parking garage located underneath the Boston Common.
($11 all day)

Donations are as follows;
$25 donation enters you and/or your pet in the parade to
march. You and/or your pet will be entered into the costume
contests and a chance to win amazing prizes. You will also
receive an event nylon tote/backpack to trick or treat to
sponsors and vendors for fun give-aways.

$50 donation gets you all of the above, BUT, as a VIP, you will
march at the front of the parade, behind Universal Motown
recording group JADA, Randy Price, our celebrity judges and the
Salem High School Marching Band with Boston Celebs, which may
include radio personalities, news anchors, athletes, writers,
politicians, etc. You will receive an event VIP badge for
access to this section of the parade.


Some prizes are as follows;
Two-night stay at the 70 Park Ave hotel in NYC
One-night stay in Deluxe accommodations at the MUSE hotel in NYC
One-night stay in Deluxe accom. at the Intercontinental Boston w/ dinner for
2 at their restaurant Miel
Two night stay in a Jr. Suite at the historic Omni Parker House with dinner for
2 one night
One-night stay at the Hyatt Regency, Downtown
One night stay in Deluxe accommodations at the Nine Zero Hotel, Boston
One night stay in Deluxe accommodations at the Onyx Hotel, Boston
One night stay in Deluxe accommodations at the Hotel Marlowe, Cambridge
Blue Man Group tickets
$100 gift certificate to the Melting Pot
$100 gift certificate to Fugakyu in Brookline
(3) Dinners for two at California Pizza Kitchen
Dinner for 4 at Jacob Wirth Restaurant and Pub
Dinners for two all over Boston
Planet Dog Gift baskets
And much more……….

Costume Categories;
Most Outrageous Dog
Most Original Dog
Best Group or ensemble


At the end of the parade route, JP Licks will be serving
coffee, hot chocolate, doggie sorbet (and ice cream, depending
on the weather…)

Make sure your dog brushes up on their commands, because after
the prizes have been awarded in the costume contest, stick
around, Randy Price will be ‘Simon’ in a game of “Simon Says….”
(for the dogs)

See you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in front of the entrance to Doggie Daycare-by the coffee stand

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: 4th Annual Divas Unleashed™ Halloween Pet Parade
